sum(rate(mist_trigger_time{catalyst_node=~".*studio",region=~"${region:pipe}",catalyst_node=~"${catalyst_node:pipe}"}[15m])) by (catalyst_node, trigger) / on(trigger, catalyst_node) sum(rate(mist_trigger_count{catalyst_node=~".*studio",region=~"${region:pipe}",catalyst_node=~"${catalyst_node:pipe}"}[15m])) by (catalyst_node, trigger)
